name: SEGA Slots: Vegas Casino 777
description:
SEGA SLOTS - FREE VEGAS STYLE SLOTS GAME!
SEGA Slots give you a chance to WIN glorious JACKPOTS in some of the fastest, most addictive slots machines around! Vegas is just a few clicks away. Install SEGA Slots NOW!

VEGAS CASINO STYLE SLOTS
- Earn FREE SPINS and hit glorious JACKPOTS in some of the fastest, most addictive slots machines around!
- Classic Vegas style slots themed after your favorite SEGA characters
- Progress through your SEGA favorites and win! win! win!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
- Join friends in multiplayer slots and spin for the hugest payouts
- Team up with up to 6 of your friends and multiply your rewards

PLAY SEGA CLASSICS AS SLOTS!
- Join Sonic the Hedgehog in an adventure to rescue his friends and earn huge payouts
- Play Super Monkey Ball Slots with friends, and race to for big rewards
- Duel the Shadow Master in Shinobi Slots for WILD wins
- Power up with potions in Golden Axe Slots
- Spin to win in Sonic Casino Nights
- Plunder the most treasure in Super Monkey Ball Pirates

SEGA Slots offers several optional subscription packages to unlock premium features and additional bonuses:
- Exclusive Machine unlocks
- Daily coin gifts
- Monthly VIP points
- Reward bonuses

SEGA Slots offers several options for monthly subscriptions in addition to other gameplay features. Optional subscription cost is $4.99 per month of the VIP Gold Subscription, and $19.99 per month for the Platinum VIP Subscription. Subscription plans auto-renew monthly.

- Subscription plans will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew monthly, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

- Account will be automatically charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of renewal.

- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

- You can cancel your subscription at anytime through your iTunes Account Settings. Cancelation must take place 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the active subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.

- If you choose not to subscribe to a SEGA Slots VIP Subscription plan, you can simply play SEGA Slots for free.

Download SEGA Slots and start winning now!
